mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(boardNum, boardId, boardSubject, boardContent, boardDate) values (#{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET boardCount=boardCount+1 where boardNum=#{param1}
UPDATE board SET boardNum = boardNum - 1 where boardNum > #{param1}
UPDATE board SET boardSubject=#{param2}, boardContent=#{param3} where boardNum=#{param1}
